lead_paragraph: A work by the Impressionist master Edgar Degas has been stolen from an exhibition in Marseille, Agence France-Presse reported.
snippet: A work by the Impressionist master Edgar Degas has been stolen from an exhibition in Marseille, Agence France-Presse reported.

headline.main: Degas Work Stolen From French Museum
